Name: Villager
Effect: Give the Encouraged alteration to this character.

Name: Priest
Effect: Copy the effect of an ally in the front position.

Name: Archer
Effect: Destroy a character in the back position.

Name: Knight
Effect: If a character in the back position is to be destroyed, destroy this ally instead.

Name: King
Effect: Give the Encouraged alteration to another ally.

Name: Queen
Effect: Gain 1 permanent point each time you trigger a Played effect.

Name: Bard
Effect: Reveal 1 card from the deck, you may play it if it is a Human, otherwise keep it in your hand.
